Name: Exo-Adventures
About the game: Join the exploration in this fast-paced space platformer video game. Take control of your astronaut as you explore and clear out sectors of hostile exoplanets. Key Features/Details - Beamed down onto the surface of a hostile planet your goal is to reach the end of each zone. - Quick and responsive movement combined with your rocket boosters, which allow for multiple jumps, provide a fast pace and action-packed gameplay experience. - When you first beam down you will have a small shield. This can protect you for a short time and when it runs out you will start to take damage to your health. - You start your mission with 3 re-links. These allow you to teleport back to the start of the zone or to an activated re-link station when your health reaches critical levels. - Be on the lookout for both med-packs and extra re-links scattered across the surface. These will greatly increase your chances of survival! - Avoid dangerous alien life and hazardous terrain so you can make it to the end in one piece. - An experience that is both challenging and fun, how quickly can you make it to the end?
